# Problem 1


```{r Problem_1}
library(tidyverse)

first_df = tibble(
  x = rnorm(8),
  logical_vec = x > 0,
  vec_char = 8,
  x <- factor(c("a","b","c")),
)

mean(pull(first_df, x))
```

# Problem 2


```{r Problem 2}
second_df = tibble(
  x = rnorm(500),
  y = rnorm(500),
  logical_vec = x + y > 1,
  num_vec = as.numeric(logical_vec),
  fac_vec = as.factor(logical_vec),
)

nrow(second_df)
ncol(second_df)
pull(second_df, x)
mean(pull(second_df, x))
median(pull(second_df, x))
sd(pull(second_df, x))
pull(second_df, y)
pull(second_df, num_vec)
pull(second_df, fac_vec)

```
Number of rows = 500 
Number of columns = 5
Mean = 0.03911527
Median = 0.03718347
Standard Deviation = 1.043226

```{r scatter_plot}
ggplot(second_df, aes(x = x, y = y, color = y)) + geom_point()

ggsave("scatter_plotHW1.pdf")
```
